copy: I opened a company to solve everyday problems and facilities in the use of Web and Mobile systems, with a focus on working with cutting edge technologies in the market. Using technologies such as Azure Cloud Services, Azure DevOps, Github, for content storage and app publishing, and the tools below for building apps:

Developing applications of internal solutions for the management of the company with a distance learning portal, signature generator for email, api rest for data synchronization and a carometer for ratchet exit control.
I worked as a network and infrastructure administrator, managing local and virtual servers, building cutting-edge applications and using open-source tools for everyday focus.
Beginning of my career in technology, serving end users with Emails, Drives, Workbooks and support with computers in general, being Gsuite administrator among other internal applications.
